1370: Snelle moved to Marcktgang.A.4 after marriage.
Got married to Vreile at age 19 in 1370.
1372: Had a daughter with Vreile, Saxiardis, at age 21.
1375: Had a daughter with Vreile, Mette, at age 24.
1376: Had a daughter with Vreile, Scilla, at age 25.
1378: Had a son with Vreile, Paradanus, at age 27.
1380: Had a son with Vreile, Wein, at age 29.
1384: Lost daughter Saxiardis when Saxiardis was 13 years old.
Became caretaker of Mette, Scilla, Paradanus, Wein at age 34.
